title: Remove copyright year text from UI

requirements.summary: Remove any rendered "©" + year copyright text from the UI (including the Closing section footer) while keeping layout visually consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: The Closing section footer no longer renders any "©" + year text (e.g., "© 2026" or "© 2024").
No other screen (prompt, reveal, hero, message, games, nav) displays "© 2026" anywhere in the UI.
The page layout remains visually consistent after removal (no awkward extra spacing or empty footer element).

file_operations.description: Remove the dynamic year calculation and delete the footer block that renders the "© {currentYear}" text; adjust surrounding spacing/classes so the section ends cleanly without an empty footer area, and remove any now-unused imports to keep the file clean.
